description:
HighScale Ai, a trailblazing creative advertising agency, is actively seeking a talented Content Creator Intern who possesses a keen eye for visual storytelling and a passion for crafting compelling narratives across various platforms. If you're someone who thrives on creativity, this internship provides a unique opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge campaigns and enhance your skills in a dynamic and innovative environment.

Position: Content Creator Intern

Location: Downtown Los Angeles, CA (On-Site)

About HighScale Ai:

HighScale Ai is reshaping the advertising landscape through creative and technology-driven solutions. As a Content Creator Intern, you'll play a pivotal role in crafting engaging content for digital platforms while bringing your expertise in writing SMS and email promotional copy to the forefront.

Responsibilities:

  • Content Production: Develop creative and engaging content for various digital platforms, including social media, websites, and promotional materials.
  • Visual Storytelling: Bring ideas to life through visual storytelling, leveraging graphic design, photography, and video creation.
  • Copywriting Excellence: Utilize your experience in writing SMS and email promotional copy to enhance the impact of our campaigns.
  • Collaborative Ideation: Work closely with cross-functional teams to contribute innovative ideas for content strategies and campaigns.
  • Brand Consistency: Ensure consistency in brand messaging and visuals across all content platforms.

Qualifications:

  • Pursuing a degree in Communications, Marketing, Media Studies, or a related field.
  • Strong creative portfolio showcasing content creation skills (graphic design, photography, video editing, etc.).
  • Proficiency in creative tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, Capcut, TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook.
  • Experience in writing SMS and email promotional copy.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Passion for staying updated on industry trends and emerging content formats.

What We Offer:

  • Hands-on experience in a creative and collaborative environment.
  • Mentorship from experienced content creators and marketers.
  • Opportunities for professional development and growth.
  • Competitive compensation and potential for future full-time opportunities.

HighScale Ai is committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace. We encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply.
